name: The Cake Is A Lie (Karim Chanane)
name_original: The Cake Is A Lie (Karim Chanane)
description:
Use WASD or Arrowkeys to move around your cake knife, press spacebar to cut. 

This was made for the Trijam #77: The 3 hour game jam (theme: the game lies), although i went a little overboard and spent about 7.5 hours on this little...thing. Havn't made a game in a while and i made all "art" and sound myself, which is a first. All in all a fun little project.
